data.message: Fix hookify hang for MCP tools: Added fast-path optimization to PreToolUse and PostToolUse hooks in hookify plugin. MCP tools (tool_name.startswith('mcp__')) now skip rule evaluation entirely since hookify rules only target Bash and file events. PostToolUse still performs S2 secret scanning for MCP tool output. This should eliminate the hang when calling duro_reembed and other MCP tools.
